p.strong: Steps to create a new case:

ol.li: Use the CRM app to manage client interactions and conduct the required Know Your Customer (KYC) assessment before accepting a case.
Create a Sale Order from scratch or use the Standard Lawyer Service Quotation template.

Adapt your Terms & Conditions directly on the quotation, and the customers will be able to sign it through their Odoo portal, or create or use the template of the Engagement Letter in the Sign App, and request the client's signature for the agreement.
Confirm the Sale Order, which will automatically generate the related Project and Tasks.
